org.robolectric.shadows
Class ShadowSQLiteDatabase

java.lang.Object
  org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowSQLiteClosable
      org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowSQLiteDatabase

@Implements(value=android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase.class,
            inheritImplementationMethods=true)
public class ShadowSQLiteDatabase
extends ShadowSQLiteClosable

Shadow for SQLiteDatabase that simulates the movement of a Cursor through database tables. Implemented as a wrapper around an embedded SQL database, accessed via JDBC. The JDBC connection is made available to test cases for use in fixture setup and assertions.
